title: Trump decries 'TACO trade' jab
shortDescription: President Trump was asked about the acronym “TACO,” which stands for "Trump always chickens out” - a jab coined by financial analysts.

title: Bird flu vaccine development cancelled by Trump administration
shortDescription: Moderna had been awarded over $750 million to develop a vaccine against bird flu, which has been circulating in farm animals and sickening people.

title: Trump-backed Gaza aid plan marred by stampede
shortDescription: People stampeded and shots were fired as a Trump-backed plan to distribute food in Gaza at sites guarded by armed contractors got started.

title: Trump erupts at Wall Street's 'TACO trade' nickname for his tariffs
shortDescription: The acronym stands for "Trump always chickens out" a jab at the president's propensity to impose or threaten steep tariffs and later back off.

title: Trump pardons former NY Congressman Michael Grimm for tax fraud
shortDescription: Grimm who represented Staten Island and parts of Brooklyn in Congress from 2011 to 2015, pleaded guilty in December 2014 to tax fraud.

title: Exclusive: Trump pardons former Army officer who disobeyed COVID rules
shortDescription: President Trump issued a full and unconditional pardon to a former U.S. army officer convicted of refusing to follow COVID-19 safety rules.

title: Musk criticizes Trump's bill: Key moments in the pair's partnership
shortDescription: Musk this week criticized Trump's megabill, signaling a change in the pair's whirlwind political partnership.

title: Donald Trump nominates personal attorney Emil Bove as federal judge
shortDescription: The president chose his former criminal defense attorney to sit on the bench in the appeals court based in Philadelphia.

title: Trump responds to Musk saying he's 'disappointed' in big tax bill
shortDescription: Donald Trump's sweeping tax legislation is expected to cost around $3.8 trillion over the next 10 years.

title: Trump says he'll look at pardoning Whitmer kidnapping plot convicts
shortDescription: Nine people were convicted or pleaded guilty to either federal or separate state charges in a plot to kidnap Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer.

title: Comey explains Trump post, airs doubts about Kash Patel
shortDescription: The former FBI director was fired by Trump in 2017 and has been an outspoken critic of the president since.

title: 'Very disappointed': Trump again criticizes Putin's behavior
shortDescription: Trump called Putin 'crazy' over the weekend and said May 27 he's 'playing with fire' as he continues to bombard Ukraine during peace negotiations.

title: Trump offers 'Golden Dome' protection to Canada. But there's a catch.
shortDescription: Trump tells Canada it can join his proposed "Golden Dome" missile defense system for free - but there's a catch.

title: Trump asks SCOTUS to intervene in deportations to third countries
shortDescription: Plus: The latest on President Trump's feud with Harvard. | Trump administration halts scheduling of new student visa appointments.

title: Elon Musk 'disappointed' with the tax bill
shortDescription: Elon Musk told CBS he is 'disappointed' with President Donald Trump's 'big, beautiful' tax bill.

title: Was Barron Trump rejected by Harvard? False rumors swirl
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is in a fierce battle against Harvard University. Was Barron Trump rejected from the school? Where does he go to college?

title: Elon Musk bemoans DOGE becoming the White House 'whipping boy'
shortDescription: Elon Musk says DOGE is getting blamed for all problems that arise in the government, calling it the "whipping boy" in the Trump administration.

title: 50 years after Vietnam War, refugees swept up by Trump's crackdown
shortDescription: Despite criminal convictions, successive Republican and Democratic administrations have shielded them from deportation since the war's end.

title: Elon Musk says he's 'disappointed' by the cost of Trump's tax bill
shortDescription: Billionaire DOGE leader Elon Musk said in an interview that he's “disappointed” by the cost of Donald Trump’s sweeping tax bill passed by the House.

title: Boos, jeers at Nebraska GOP town hall over Trump's tax bill
shortDescription: Rep. Mike Flood, R-Nebraska, faced an angry crowd demanding answers on the GOP megabill.

title: Harvard community protest Trump's policies
shortDescription: Harvard students, professors, and supporters protested President Donald Trump's policies regarding the university and its international students.

title: Trump plans to pardon Todd and Julie Chrisley
shortDescription: President Trump called Savannah Chrisley from the Oval Office in the White House to tell her he wants to pardon her parents, Todd and Julie Chrisley.
